name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moneo AI - New Tab, Tab Manager, Bookmarks, Split View

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moneo AI is your beautifully designed productivity hub, powered by AI, that helps you save up to 60 hours a month.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moneo AI New Tab Extension – Simplify your day and get more time for what matters! 🎉

Moneo AI is your new best friend for productivity! We’ve designed this tool to make your everyday tasks easier so you can have more time for the things you really care about. Whether you want to get more done in less time, work more efficiently, or even increase your earnings, Moneo AI is here to help! ✨

Key Features:

🏠 Home Page:

🕚 Time your way - Choose between regular or percentage clock modes, with AM/PM options. Get personalized greetings and motivational mantras plus your local weather at a glance.

🌤️ Weather on tap - Click on the weather and instantly set your location for real-time updates.

🧘🏼‍♀️ Switch search engines - Easily flip between your favorite search engines in just one click!

✅ To-do list -  Keep your tasks in check with our simple, built-in to-do list.

💬 Daily quotes - Get inspired with uplifting quotes at the bottom of your screen.

📂 Tab Manager:

🏷️ Active Tabs: Quickly manage all your open tabs with a handy search feature and checkboxes for easy selection.

📚 Bookmarks: Access all your bookmarked sites in a snap.

📌 Session Saver: Save your browser sessions and never lose track of your tabs again!

📸 Capture:

📷 Take Screenshots: Capture anything on your screen effortlessly! Choose between the entire screen, specific windows, or Chrome tabs.

🤖 Moneo AI Page:

⌨️ AI Chat: Chat with our friendly AI assistant to get answers, advice, or just brainstorm ideas!

📝 Prompts & History: Access preset prompts and revisit your chat history whenever you need.

🔎 Saved Chats: Save important conversations and keep them handy for later.

🖥️ Split View Page:

🪟 Split View: Multitask like a pro by viewing two tabs side-by-side! Perfect for research, comparison, or juggling tasks. 💡

📌 Side Panel:

Access all these features in a convenient side panel while you work:

📂 Tab Manager

🤖 Moneo AI

🪟 Split View



🛡️ Privacy & Security

We take your privacy seriously! At Moneo, we are committed to protecting your personal information. The data we gather or process is used solely to enhance the core functionality of our tool and improve the quality and security of our service. Rest assured, your information is never sold to third parties. For more details on our privacy practices, visit our https://www.alva.solutions/privacy.

🙋🏼‍♀️ Help & Contact Resources

Need assistance? We’ve got you covered!

Help Center: Visit our Help Center for FAQs and guides https://www.alva.solutions/app/dashboard/support.

Contact Us: Have a question? Reach out to us anytime at info@alva.solutions

👩🏼‍💻 Follow Us on Social Media

Stay connected and updated!


Instagram: Follow us on Instagram for inspiration and behind-the-scenes content!
https://www.instagram.com/alva.extensions/

TikTok: Discover updates and tips on our TikTok channel. 
https://www.tiktok.com/@alvasolutions

Moneo AI is your personal productivity booster, designed to help you tackle tasks with ease, stay organized, and free up your time for what truly matters. Download now and start living your most productive life today! 🚀✨
